title: Delete the automatic message for a Business Account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: A short-term access token authorized by the TikTok Business Account owner. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: auto_message_type
parameters.description: The type of automatic message. Enum values: SUGGESTED_QUESTION : suggested question. A suggested question is a frequently asked question displayed at the beginning of a chat. When the user selects a suggested question, the user will automatically receive the corresponding preset answer. CHAT_PROMPT : chat prompt. A chat prompt is an interactive button displayed above the input box. When users tap a chat prompt, the system will automatically generate a corresponding question for users to start the conversation. Note : The welcome message for a Business Account cannot be deleted. You can only turn off the welcome message via /business/message/auto_message/status/update/ .

parameters.name: auto_message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the automatic message. To retrieve the automatic messages for a Business Account, use /business/message/auto_message/get/ .
